title: If you were to create your very own political ideology, what would it look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unityism; Social issues: Freedom of Religion as second-highest right. Expression and Thought are third-highest right. Take one guess which is first highest right. Abortion is permitted up to, but not including birth - that is when the child becomes capable of living on itself. Euthanasia is legal, for those with terminal illness only. Guns are a privilege, not a right. Handguns and Semi-automatics are restricted weapons, only for those with a valid reason, i.e . Semi-autos cannot be bought for sport shooting, while handguns can. Full-automatics are illegal, end of story. Every other gun (Pump-action, Bolt-action, Lever etc etc) can be bought for reasons not related to self-defense, i.e hunting. Also, universal background checks and gun registries are in place. One can only transport firearms when one has a lawful reason for doing so (going to hunt, sports shooting etc etc) and they must be in a dedicated gun case. The family models of 2 parents, and 2 parents +grandparents are to be championed as the best family models for stability. Both Personal Responsibility and Collectivism is to be entwined. You are not out there solely for yourself. You live in our country - you live to our expectations, and that is to enrich the community you live in. Healthcare: Free single-payer healthcare for all, ensuring that those most unable are covered. Mental health is to be taken seriously, and government income will be spent on ensuring mental health facilities are available, especially to those most vulnerable who generally are the least able to access them. Private hospitals, catering to the middle-class and upper-class, still exist. These are for profit. Economy: Government intervenes to prevent any: Collusion from occuring.Monopoly from occuring.Generally anything which is anti-consumer behaviour. Government supports small and medium domestic businesses through subsidies, handouts, business counselling etc etc. Government funds research companies, especially domestic ones. Government controls OCR and taxes in order to influence economy and maintain stable growth whilst minimizing inflation. Government can intervene when market economy is slowing down through economic stimulus. Government can also intervene when market economy is doing well through stimulus. For that matter, there is a progressive tax system for businesses, based on profit, thus meaning that taxes decrease or increase based on company performance. Below $5000 profit, tax is only 10% for anything below the $5000 bracket, while at profit above $100 million, tax is at 35% for any profit above the $100 million bracket. Also, progressive tax for consumers. Anything below $10,000 gross income a year is taxed at 10%, whilst anything above $90,000 is taxed at 33%. Military: Volunteer forces only, no conscription. Military spending is to ensure that the services are able to do their job: defend national interests. Education: Free education up to university, free education up to 3 years for universities. Education is to be funded so the next generation gets the best in education. There you go — the political ideology I would have if I made a party and what we stand for.

Economy: No oligopolies or monopolies. I would prevent markets from taking up a huge share that they can control the prices and the supply.Flat tax. Companies offshoring more than keeping businesses in the country pay a higher tax. If they hire illegals, the firms gets fined and pay a very high tax. Abolish pointless taxes.Deregulate pointless regulations.Cut welfare and don’t give foreign aid. Expand unemployment insurance. Cut military spending. Create corporations from scratch to privatize later. Cut abortion funding.A low minimum wage for anyone under 24. Anyone 24 or older .If a “bubble” is forming on a sector, pop it and intervene as quick as possible.Trade with anyone.Domestic Policy: No government spying.Allow guns. All guns registered. Mentally ill, suspected terrorist, anyone in the no-fly list can’t have guns.If seller sold to anyone on this list, they’ll be fined, jailed and pay high taxes for a few years.Provide rights for all and apply rule of law. No special treatment.Decriminalize drugsTwo-tier health care system. Some parts free and some parts are not. I don’t want anyone taking advantage of a free health system. Diseases, cancers, workplace injuries and some psychiatric diagnoses are free. The rest I don’t list must payReform education. State decides what to teach. No indoctrination and make primary and secondary schools more interesting. Put a price cap for tuition and build more post secondary institutes rather than make education free.Term limits for all politicians.Lobbyist can’t donate. Every political party have a cap on election spending.Foreign Policy: Don’t intervene another countries unless we have to.Stay neutralSocial: Abortions allowed up to 3 months unless proof of rape, miscarriage, fetus has disability and threat to mother’s life.Justice: Death penalty exist. Only applied to terrible crimesAnyone currently in prison for drug possession get rehab.Environment: Treat animals like it’s a market to devalue them.Subsidize only on energy research.
